md:
giải nghĩa từ "principle" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Principle (noun) - Nguyên tắc, nguyên lý

+ Meaning: A fundamental truth or proposition that serves as the basis for a system of belief or behavior.

+ Example: The principle of democracy is that all citizens have equal rights.

+ Related words: principle, principal, principled

* Principle (noun) - Nguyên tắc, quy tắc

+ Meaning: A rule or standard, especially one that is accepted as a basis for a particular area of activity.

+ Example: The principle of the game is to score as many points as possible.

+ Related words: principle, rule, regulation

* Principle (noun) - Lý thuyết, học thuyết

+ Meaning: A general idea or concept that is used to explain or understand something.

+ Example: The principle of relativity is a fundamental concept in modern physics.

+ Related words: principle, theory, concept

* Principle (noun) - Tinh thần, nguyên tắc đạo đức

+ Meaning: A moral rule or standard that guides one's behavior or decision-making.

+ Example: The principle of honesty is essential in business.

+ Related words: principle, morality, ethics
html:
giải nghĩa từ "principle" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  • Principle (noun) - Nguyên tắc, nguyên lý

  • Meaning: A fundamental truth or proposition that serves as the basis for a system of belief or behavior.

  • Example: The principle of democracy is that all citizens have equal rights.

  • Related words: principle, principal, principled

  • Principle (noun) - Nguyên tắc, quy tắc

  • Meaning: A rule or standard, especially one that is accepted as a basis for a particular area of activity.

  • Example: The principle of the game is to score as many points as possible.

  • Related words: principle, rule, regulation

  • Principle (noun) - Lý thuyết, học thuyết

  • Meaning: A general idea or concept that is used to explain or understand something.

  • Example: The principle of relativity is a fundamental concept in modern physics.

  • Related words: principle, theory, concept

  • Principle (noun) - Tinh thần, nguyên tắc đạo đức

  • Meaning: A moral rule or standard that guides one's behavior or decision-making.

  • Example: The principle of honesty is essential in business.

  • Related words: principle, morality, ethics
